typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		customer_id as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	dateFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy'],
	timestampFormats: ['MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss']) ~> Customers
source(output(
		sr_id as long,
		customer_id as long,
		product_id as long,
		sr_description as string,
		sr_open_date as timestamp,
		sr_close_date as timestamp,
		sr_type as string,
		channel as string,
		sr_cust_feedback as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	dateFormats: ['yyyy/MM/dd']) ~> SRS
SRS, Customers assert(expectTrue(!isNull(sr_id), false, 'srIDNotNull'),
	expectExists(SRS@customer_id == Customers@customer_id, false, 'custIDExists'),
	expectTrue(length(sr_description) > 0 && length(sr_description) <= 100, false, 'descriptionLength'),
	expectTrue(sr_close_date >= sr_open_date, false, 'validCloseDate'),
	expectTrue(length(sr_cust_feedback) > 0 && length(sr_cust_feedback) <= 100, false, 'custFeedbackLength')) ~> Assert1
Assert1 filter(isError()) ~> Filter1
Assert1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SrsClean
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	format: 'parquet',
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> srsErrors
